titles.title: Something In My Heart Like A Stream Flowing Down

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Something in my heart like a stream flowing down
Makes me feel so happy, as happy as can be
When I think of Jesus and what He's done for me
There's something in my heart like a stream coming down.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Coming down, down, down,
Coming down, down, down,
The glory of the Lord is coming down
Where the saints of God are found
There is glory all around.
The glory of the Lord is coming down.
